panels.description: Total Connected Peers for both inbound and outbound per peer.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (aptos_connections{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"})

panels.title: Total Connected Peers

panels.description: Total Inbound connected peers.  There should be at most one peer with 0 inbound connections.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (aptos_connections{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="inbound"})

panels.title: Inbound Connected Peers

panels.description: Total outbound connections per peer.  Every node should have an outbound connection.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(aptos_connections{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="outbound"})

panels.title: Outbound Connected Peers

panels.description: Value is > 0 if there is a mismatch between onchain and actual network key on the interface

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (aptos_network_key_mismatch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"})

panels.title: Network Key Mismatches

panels.description: Inbound number of bytes passed through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="allowed", direction="inbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Inbound Allowed bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of bytes passed through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="allowed", direction="outbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Outbound Allowed bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Inbound number of bytes rate limited through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="throttled", direction="inbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Inbound Throttled bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of bytes rate limited through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="throttled", direction="outbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Outbound Throttled bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Inbound number of bytes received on the network

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m])

panels.title: Network Inbound bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of bytes sent on the network

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m])

panels.title: Network Outbound bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Inbound number of messages received on the network

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_app_inbound_traffic_count{role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m])

panels.title: Network Inbound messages (messages/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of messages sent on the network

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_app_outbound_traffic_count{role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[1m])

panels.title: Network Outbound messages (messages/s)

panels.description: TBD

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_network_notifications{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="enqueued"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_network_notifications{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="dequeued"})

panels.title: Network Notifications Queued

panels.description: TBD

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_peer_manager_requests{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="enqueued"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_peer_manager_requests{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="dequeued"})

panels.title: Peer Manager Requests Queued

panels.description: TBD

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_requests{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="enqueued"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_requests{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="dequeued"})

panels.title: Network Requests Queued

panels.description: TBD

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_health_check_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="enqueued"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role)(aptos_network_pending_health_check_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type",state="dequeued"})

panels.title: Pending Health Check Events Queued

panels.description: TBD

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_pending_wire_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: Pending Wire Messages

panels.description: TBD

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_pending_connectivity_manager_requests{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: Pending Connectivity Manager Requests

panels.description: RPCs declined or canceled due to hitting max RPC capacity or max queue capacity.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"(declined|canceled)"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: RPC Messages Drop Rate

panels.description: The rate of new inbound connections on the network interface

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (rate(aptos_network_pending_connection_upgrades{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="inbound" }[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Inbound Pending Connection Upgrades

panels.description: The rate of new outbound connections on the network interface

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (rate(aptos_network_pending_connection_upgrades{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="outbound" }[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Outbound Pending Connection Upgrades

panels.description: Latency of Inbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(aptos_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="inbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Inbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P50]

panels.description: Latency of Outbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(aptos_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="outbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Outbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P50]

panels.description: Latency of Inbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(aptos_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="inbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Inbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P90]

panels.description: Latency of Outbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(aptos_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="outbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Outbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P90]

panels.description: Latency of Inbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(aptos_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="inbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Inbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P99]

panels.description: Latency of Outbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(aptos_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="outbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Outbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P99]

targets.expr: sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="request",state="failed"}[$AggInterval])) / sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="request",state=~"(sent|failed)"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: RPC Total Request Error Rate (% requests in error)

targets.expr: sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="response",state="failed"}[$AggInterval])) / sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="request",state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: RPC Total Response Error Rate (% responses in error)

panels.description: Total throughput of all Outbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (rate(aptos_network_rpc_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Outbound RPCs (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total throughput of all Inbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_rpc_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Inbound RPCs (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Outbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", type="request",state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Outbound RPCs (msg/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Inbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", type="request", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Inbound RPCs (msg/s)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(aptos_network_outbound_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(aptos_network_inbound_rpc_handler_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(aptos_network_outbound_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(aptos_network_inbound_rpc_handler_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(aptos_network_outbound_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(aptos_network_inbound_rpc_handler_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.description: Total throughput of all Outbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Outbound Direct Sends (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total throughput of all Inbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Inbound Direct Sends (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Outbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_direct_send_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Outbound Direct Sends (msg/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Inbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(aptos_network_direct_send_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Inbound Direct Sends (msg/s)
